channel.title: Pdf on Explorations ... Go Packages
channel.description: Recent content in Pdf on Explorations ... Go Packages

item.title: Markdown to PDF
item.description: I recently completed the initial release of a Markdown to PDF package. Repo is named “mdtopdf” and is here. Docs are here. The supported Markdown elements are: Emphasized and strong text Headings 1-6 Ordered and unordered lists Nested lists Images Tables Links Code blocks and back-ticked text In the “cmd” folder is an example of using the package and it contains both a test markdown file and the resultant PDF file.

item.title: Gofpdf: Create a Pdf Table From a CSV File
item.description: Creating a PDF table from a CSV file poses some challenges in fitting to the page without wrapping text content within the cell. This example here approaches the problem this way:

item.title: Gofpdf: Creating a Numbered List
item.description: This example shows how to create a number list of items here. It includes use of several methods: It uses GetStringWidth() to get the point width of the letter “m”.

item.title: Gofpdf: Creating a Pdf From a Text File
item.description: I plan to create some examples using the gofpdf package, hopefully useful in their own right. The first example creates a PDF file from a text file or STDIN. Here are a couple of use cases taken from the “readme”:
